name: Jiffy
description:
Jiffy is retro style platformer with a fast pace action pack gameplay.

Key Features :-

  • 44  challenging levels
  • 5 bosses
  • Endless Mode : procedural endless level generation
  • Battle Mode : one room , endless enemies
  • great gameplay mechanics and tight controls
  • Available for WINDOWS and ANDROID
  • change your theme color
  • Controller supported

Controls :- 

  • Direction with " A - D" or arrow keys and jump with Spacebar
  • On mobile, use onscreen controls inside the menu, simple touch won't work . ONLY pause button is touchable which is in the top left corner
  • Gamepad / Controller supported
